title: Fragments, ca. 1775
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation; plain weave has paired warps and paired wefts
dimensions:
A. (Valance) Warp: 18cm (7 1/2in.). Weft (3 widths sewn together). 231.5cm 95in. 
B. Warp: 44.5cm (17 1/2in). Weft: 88cm (34 1/2in.) All edges cut. 
C. Warp: 45.5cm (17 3/4in.). Weft: 87.5cm (34 1/2in.) All edges cut. 
D. Warp: 44cm (17 1/4in.). Weft: 87cm (34 1/2in.) All edges cut.
E. Warp: 42cm (16 1/2in.). Weft: 15.5cm (6 in.) All edges cut 
F. Warp: 40.5cm (16in.). Weft: 15cm (6in.). Left selvedge present.
description: A valance and five fragments of a pattern showing two chinoiserie scenes; the first a woman and children in front of a stall with urns, man leaning on counter; the other a seated couple, the man playing a musical instrument with two children and an adult in the background. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, ca. 1775.
ca. 1775. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation; plain weave has paired warps and paired wefts. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-72-a/f.
